short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helpful tips and reminders to stay healthy and avoid contracting or spreading the COVID-19 Coronavirus, when you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There are a few things you can do to stay healthy during the current coronavirus pandemic, like washing your hands, minimizing social contact, and not touching your face. This extension will help you remember to practice these new habits, by showing you a quick tip every time you open a new tab.
